featured.text: The one thing I can guarantee is none of us will have taken a cruise, none of us will be sitting on a beach with a pina colada.

definition.zh_def: 鳳梨，一種熱帶水果，外皮粗糙，內部多汁且甜。
definition.en_def: Pineapple, a tropical fruit with a rough exterior and sweet, juicy interior.
definition.example: I made a delicious smoothie with fresh pineapple.
